original_text: You shall serve the Lord your God, and he will bless your bread and your water, and I will take sickness away from among you.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와를 섬기라 그리하면 여호와가 너희의 양식과 물에 복을 내리고 너희 중에서 병을 제하리니

sentences.original_text: You shall serve the Lord your God
and he will bless your bread and your water
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너의 빵과 물을 축복할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and I will take sickness away from among you.
